Title: Relates to reporting requirements for the department of transportation
Summary: Requires the department of transportation to submit annual reporting to the minority leader of the senate, the minority leader of the assembly, the ranking minority member of the senate transportation committee, the ranking minority member of the assembly transportation committee, the ranking minority member of the senate finance committee, and the ranking minority member of the assembly ways and means committee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to annual reporting by the department of transportation
